column1: Little Goat Diner////One of my favorite lunch spots in the city
column2: the menu is a little quirky
column3: but nothing too crazy that you cannot find something you might like. There always seems to be a long wait here
column4: go at a time that's not the conventional lunch time and it won't be too bad. The Goat burger is delicious
column5: but I haven't tried anything here that I didn't like. It's worth the wait!!
